items.sentence: Tom thinks that personality is more important than looks.
Tom thought he should try defusing the situation quickly.
A lot of people don\'t realize how easy it is to do that.
I wish you didn\'t look like you were having so much fun.
I\'ve already forgotten what I ate for dinner last night.
I wasn\'t the one who told Tom that he couldn\'t be here.
We\'ve got to clean the living room before mom gets home.
Westbound traffic won\'t be affected by the construction.
What would happen if you didn\'t do what Tom told you to?
Tom promised that he would be more careful in the future.
